contextMenuItemOpenInDownloader.description: Title of context menu item - same for selection/link/page.

messageRequestStarting.description: Message shown when request is starting.

messageResponseSuccess.description: Message shown when request was successful.

messageResponseSkipped.description: Message shown when request was understood, but the URL is already queued.

messageResponseError.description: Message shown when request was understood, but the URL is problematic, e.g. not downloadable.

messageResponsePending.description: Message shown for number of pending (not done and not failed) requests.

messageResponseFailed.description: Message shown when request failed or failed parsing response.
